en.title: US Exchange Visitor Visa (J-1/J-2)
en.intro: The J-1 visa program promotes cultural exchange by bringing international visitors to the United States for education, training, research, and other exchange programs. The J-2 visa is for dependents.

overview.heading: Overview
overview.description: The J-1 Exchange Visitor Program enables foreign nationals to come to the US to teach, study, conduct research, demonstrate special skills, or receive training. This visa strengthens cultural ties and promotes mutual understanding between the US and other nations.

why_choose.heading: Benefits of J-1 Program
reasons: Diverse program categories for various professions
J-2 dependents can apply for work authorization
Access to world-class institutions and organizations
Potential pathway to future US opportunities

categories.name: Summer Work Travel
categories.description: Work and travel in the US during summer months

categories.name: Camp Counselor
categories.description: Work at US summer camps with American youth

categories.name: Professional Trainees
categories.description: Structured training programs for professionals

categories.name: Interns
categories.description: Gain practical experience in your career field

categories.name: College/University Student
categories.description: Study at accredited post-secondary institutions

categories.name: Secondary School Student
categories.description: High school exchange programs

categories.name: Research Scholar
categories.description: Conduct research at US institutions

categories.name: University Professor
categories.description: Teach or conduct research at universities

categories.name: Teachers
categories.description: Teach in US schools and educational institutions

categories.name: Physicians
categories.description: Medical graduates for graduate medical education or training

categories.name: Au Pair
categories.description: Live with American families, provide childcare, and experience American culture

categories.name: International Visitors
categories.description: Selected by the US government for professional visits

categories.name: Government Visitors
categories.description: Government officials on cultural exchange programs

categories.name: Specialists
categories.description: Demonstrate special skills or provide expertise

categories.name: Short-term Scholars
categories.description: Brief research, lecture, or consultation visits

categories.name: Science & Technology
categories.description: Research and development in STEM fields

how_to_apply.heading: Application Process
steps: Receive visa and prepare for travel

en.processing_time: Typically 2-4 weeks, apply well in advance of program start date
en.validity: Duration varies by program category, from weeks to several years
en.two_year_rule: Some J-1 holders subject to 2-year home residency requirement

j2_dependent_visa.heading: J-2 Dependent Visa
j2_dependent_visa.description: J-2 visas are available for spouses and unmarried children under 21 of J-1 visa holders.
benefits: Can accompany J-1 visa holder to the US
Eligible to apply for work authorization (EAD)
Same duration as J-1 principal's program

work_authorization.heading: Work Authorization
work_authorization.j1: Work authorization depends on program category and sponsor approval
work_authorization.j2: J-2 dependents can apply for Employment Authorization Document (EAD)

important_notes: Must maintain valid program status throughout stay
Cannot overstay visa expiration or program end date
Some categories subject to 2-year home residency requirement
Must comply with sponsor organization rules and regulations
Grace period: 30 days after program completion
en.cta: Start Your J-1 Exchange Program Application!

ar.title: تأشيرة التبادل الثقافي الأمريكية (J-1/J-2)
ar.intro: برنامج تأشيرة J-1 يعزز التبادل الثقافي من خلال جلب الزوار الدوليين إلى الولايات المتحدة للتعليم والتدريب والبحث وبرامج التبادل الأخرى. تأشيرة J-2 للمعالين.

overview.heading: نظرة عامة
overview.description: برنامج زوار التبادل J-1 يمكّن المواطنين الأجانب من القدوم إلى الولايات المتحدة للتدريس أو الدراسة أو إجراء الأبحاث أو إظهار مهارات خاصة أو تلقي التدريب. هذه التأشيرة تعزز الروابط الثقافية وتعزز التفاهم المتبادل بين الولايات المتحدة والدول الأخرى.

why_choose.heading: فوائد برنامج J-1
reasons: يمكن للمعالين J-2 التقدم للحصول على تصريح عمل
الوصول إلى مؤسسات ومنظمات عالمية المستوى

ar.validity: المدة تختلف حسب فئة البرنامج، من أسابيع إلى عدة سنوات
ar.two_year_rule: بعض حاملي J-1 يخضعون لمتطلب الإقامة في الوطن لمدة عامين

benefits: يمكنهم مرافقة حامل تأشيرة J-1 إلى الولايات المتحدة

نفس مدة برنامج حامل تأشيرة J-1 الرئيسي

work_authorization.j1: يعتمد تصريح العمل على فئة البرنامج وموافقة الراعي
work_authorization.j2: يمكن للمعالين J-2 التقدم للحصول على وثيقة تصريح العمل (EAD)

important_notes: يجب الحفاظ على حالة البرنامج الصالحة طوال الإقامة
لا يمكن تجاوز تاريخ انتهاء التأشيرة أو نهاية البرنامج
بعض الفئات تخضع لمتطلب الإقامة في الوطن لمدة عامين
يجب الامتثال لقواعد وأنظمة المنظمة الراعية
فترة سماح: 30 يوماً بعد إكمال البرنامج
